ComicInfo.Summary:
Jay and Mania are hot on the heels of KISS and getting the Sword of Immortality back and do mean hot! They are running out of chances to pull this off before Hay is stranded permanently in the Wasteland with an angry demon king who is still not coping well with losing both his sword and his hand to the greatest rock band to ever live!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Stuart Sayger | 1 | B | Cover B | Reilly Brown (a) & Jim Charalampidis (c) | 2 | C | Cover C | Brent Schoonover (a) & Alberto Silva (c) | 3 | D | Cover D | Photo | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Stuart Sayger | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Brent Schoonover | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Reilly Brown | 7 |
